metadata.title: CVE-2022-39176 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
BlueZ before 5.59 allows physically proximate attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation because profiles/audio/avrcp.c does not validate params_len.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-39176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bluetooth - 5.48-0ubuntu3.9
bluez - 5.48-0ubuntu3.9
bluez-cups - 5.48-0ubuntu3.9
bluez-hcidump - 5.48-0ubuntu3.9
bluez-obexd - 5.48-0ubuntu3.9
bluez-tests - 5.48-0ubuntu3.9
libbluetooth3 - 5.48-0ubuntu3.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bluez package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.48-0ubuntu3.9').
